data: Home > Directory of the Institut Curie > MARIUS BICHOT Directory MARIUS BICHOT CNRS Research - Orsay Contact Functions within Institut Curie PhD Student Team : Actuatable molecules for diagnosis and theranostics Unit : Chemistry and Modelling for Biology of Cancer (UMR9187 / U1196) Presentation Marius graduated as a chemical engineer from the European School of Chemistry, Polymers and Materials (ECPM) Strasbourg and hold a Master's degree in molecular and supramolecular chemistry on the University of Strasbourg. After several internships in the field of therapeutic chemistry (INSERM, SANOFI, CEVA sant√© animale), Marius decided to pursue this path by leading his own research project in this field, opting for a thesis. Marius will be working on the development of anticancer theranostic prodrugs activated by ionizing radiation, under the supervision of Florence Mahuteau-Betzer and Guillaume Bort.
